alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Northumberland; Perry; Snyder (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 2:32PM EDT until September 07 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... Eastern Snyder County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 232 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Port Trevorton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sunbury, Shamokin, Selinsgrove, Northumberland, Winfield, Millersburg, Fairview-Ferndale, Trevorton, Shamokin Dam, Marshallton, Hummels Wharf and Port Trevorton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this severe thunderstorm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
